user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access
epics.summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and role-based access for customer profiles.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication system that includes multi-factor verification via SMS, email, or authenticator apps to safeguard customer logins. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure that customers can only view or access products and services permitted for their user roles and authorization levels. Integrate session management, timeout handling, and device-based recognition while ensuring compliance with financial data protection and cybersecurity standards.

epics.title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying products, services, and account details.
epics.description: Design a responsive and dynamic dashboard that displays the user’s current accounts, product eligibility, loan status, and available services based on customer profiles. Enable users to customize dashboard widgets and access shortcuts for common banking activities. Integrate data from the core banking system in real time to ensure users always see updated and accurate information.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
epics.summary: Provide customers the ability to submit and track account or service requests efficiently.
epics.description: Develop guided workflows that allow customers to open new accounts or request modifications to existing services with minimal input steps. Automate form population using existing data, provide validation feedback in real time, and ensure minimal navigation steps to reduce friction. Integrate these workflows with backend approval systems, enabling automated routing, verification, and confirmation processes for efficiency and transparency.

epics.title: Save Progress and Application Resume Capability
epics.summary: Enable customers to save incomplete requests and resume them seamlessly.
epics.description: Implement a save-and-resume feature allowing customers to store incomplete applications securely and retrieve them later to continue without data loss. Auto-save progress periodically and prompt users when unsaved changes exist. Provide a consolidated view of all saved drafts within the user portal for ease of access, along with clear progress indicators and contextual prompts to complete pending actions.

epics.title: Document Upload and Management
epics.summary: Allow customers to upload and manage necessary documents related to their requests.
epics.description: Develop a secure document management module allowing users to upload supporting documents such as proofs of identity and address. Ensure that uploaded files are scanned for compliance and malware before storage. Maintain encryption during upload and at rest, and allow customers to view, update, or delete uploaded documents within defined workflow stages. Ensure compliance with banking and data retention guidelines.

epics.title: Request Tracking and Notification Engine
epics.summary: Provide customers with real-time status updates on their service requests.
epics.description: Implement a request tracking engine that allows customers to track submitted applications and service modifications in real time. Send automated notifications via email, SMS, and in-portal messages for key milestones such as submission confirmation, processing, approval, or additional requirements. Allow customers to configure notification preferences and provide a centralized ‘My Notifications’ center for managing alerts and messages effectively.

epics.title: Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Maintain an immutable log of all user interactions and transactions within the portal.
epics.description: Enable comprehensive tracking and recording of all customer interactions including logins, document uploads, account requests, and service modifications. Store audit logs securely and ensure traceability for internal compliance and investigation purposes. Expose an interaction history view for customers, providing a transparent summary of their activities while maintaining control over sensitive operational data.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems for real-time operations.
epics.description: Develop secure APIs and middleware for seamless integration between the self-service portal and core banking applications. Ensure bidirectional data flow for customer information synchronization, account creation, and service status updates. Implement error handling, fallback logic, and audit tracking for all integrations, enabling transparent and reliable communication with backend systems while maintaining data consistency and accuracy.

epics.title: Independent Database Layer and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Implement an independent database to optimize performance and reliability.
epics.description: Design and deploy a dedicated portal database to facilitate efficient data caching and rapid retrieval while reducing load on the bank’s core systems. Implement data replication and synchronization workflows for real-time updates. Use indexing, query optimization, and distributed caching to ensure fast response times, even under peak load. Ensure that failover and backup mechanisms are in place for continuity and disaster recovery.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface and Accessibility
epics.summary: Deliver a responsive, accessible, and consistent user experience across devices.
epics.description: Implement responsive front-end design ensuring seamless experiences across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Adhere to accessibility guidelines to support users with disabilities, ensuring compatibility with assistive technologies. Perform usability testing across device types to validate layout consistency, navigation ease, and page responsiveness. Optimize for modern browsers and ensure loading performance meets industry standards.

epics.title: Data Security and Compliance Framework
epics.summary: Ensure end-to-end encryption, data privacy, and regulatory compliance across all modules.
epics.description: Establish comprehensive data security protocols, including encryption in transit and at rest, secure key management, and access monitoring. Adhere to financial compliance regulations such as PCI DSS, GDPR, and local data protection standards. Conduct periodic vulnerability scans and penetration testing. Implement robust incident detection and response systems along with centralized audit log analysis for enhanced governance.

epics.title: Scalability, Monitoring, and Reliability Framework
epics.summary: Ensure the platform’s scalability and reliability under varying user loads.
epics.description: Establish a monitoring and scaling framework using performance analytics, load-balancing strategies, and containerized deployment solutions. Enable auto-scaling for traffic surges and implement proactive alert systems for detecting anomalies. Provide observability for system metrics including CPU usage, memory thresholds, and response times. Maintain high availability and resilience through redundant architectures and disaster recovery plans.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication for User Security
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure the security of my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must comply with regulatory requirements, support multiple authentication methods, ensure seamless user experience.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can choose from multiple authentication methods.
2. System prompts for MFA during login.
test_cases: Given a user is trying to log in, When they enter their credentials, Then the system should prompt for an additional authentication factor.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Enforce Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to enforce role-based access control, so that users can only access data and services appropriate to their authorization levels.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles must be managed centrally, enforce least privilege, and be compliant with regulatory standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can only access data and services assigned to their roles.
2. Administrators can manage and assign roles.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When they attempt to access restricted data, Then the system should deny access.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Integrate with Centralized Identity Management Systems
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to integrate with centralized identity management systems, so that we can maintain consistent and secure user policies across the platform.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should support password recovery, centralized policy enforcement, and provide user access audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can recover passwords through the identity management system.
test_cases: Given identity management integration, When a user forgets their password, Then they should be able to recover it through the centralized system.

user_stories.title: Design User-Specific Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view banking products and services relevant to my profile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should dynamically adjust to user profile, highlight active services, and include real-time updates.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays user-specific services and offers.
2. Updates are shown in real time.
test_cases: Given a user profile, When the user logs in, Then the dashboard should display products relevant to that user.

user_stories.title: Implement Responsive and Accessible Design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the dashboard to be accessible and responsive, so that I can use it effectively across all devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must comply with WCAG standards, provide optimal performance on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard adapts to different device screen sizes.
test_cases: Given a user accessing the dashboard on a mobile device, When the screen size changes, Then the dashboard should adjust accordingly.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Self-Service Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an easy-to-follow workflow for opening a new account, so that I can complete the process quickly and efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should pre-fill known information, validate data instantly, and guide users step-by-step.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Known information is pre-filled in the application form.
test_cases: Given a user initiating a new account request, When the user inputs data, Then the system should validate the data instantly.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a guided workflow for modifying my existing services, so that I can make changes smoothly with clear status updates.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should provide clear status updates and ensure integration with back-office systems for tracking and validation.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users receive clear status updates during the modification process.
2. Changes are integrated with the back-office system for tracking.
test_cases: Given a user modifying a service, When they submit the modification request, Then they should receive status updates.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture provides a secure, scalable, and performant solution for a responsive web application with authentication, backend services, database management, integration, notifications, monitoring, security, and CI/CD processes.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address critical security and reliability gaps by adding a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and placeholder nodes for disaster recovery. All nodes and edges have been validated, and the structure adheres to ReactFlow standards with no missing or duplicate elements. The architecture now better aligns with Azure Well-Architected Framework principles, achieving a high-quality rating.
